title: ACTREC Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in-Interview for Staff Nurse Posts
description: The Advanced Centre for Treatment, Research and Education in Cancer (ACTREC) has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Staff Nurse Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the GNM, B.Sc Nursing can grab this chance and apply for the ACTREC Recruitment 2025 . Here we include the age limit, selection process, and salary structure. education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested candidates can attend the walk-in at the add...
